snippet.title: 『Ancient Weapon Holly』First Look Trailer
snippet.description:
After tens of thousands of years, the ancient weapon Holly awakens, starting her revenge against humanity. Experience the strategy of creating pitfalls to trap enemies and the exhilaration of burying them alive. Dive into intense combat!

数万年の時を経て眠りから覚めた超古代兵器ホリー。人類への復讐劇はここから始まる。 地面を割り、敵を落とし穴に落とす戦略性と、その敵を埋め潰す爽快感が特徴。緊迫の戦闘を堪能しよう！

Steam  ：https://store.steampowered.com/app/2403260/
Discord：https://discord.gg/ajawXaQqnK
Twitter ：https://twitter.com/astargames_en

・Supported Platforms: PlayStation™5 (DL), Steam™
・Release Date: 2024
・Genre: Dungeon Crawler
・Rating: IARC7+ (anticipated)

©2023 ACQUIRE Corp. All Rights Reserved.
